snippet: Pledging to be “firm, yet always fair,” Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein condemned Islamic extremism and urged international action to end conflicts in Syria and Iraq.
abstract: Zeid Ra'ad al-Hussein begins his tenure as United Nations human rights chief with strongly worded statement in which he condemns Islamic extremism; urges international action to end conflicts in Syria and Iraq.
lead_paragraph: Pledging to be “firm, yet always fair,” Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein condemned Islamic extremism and urged international action to end conflicts in Syria and Iraq.
